description.value:
Trigger Pathfinder agents enter the electric castle

Effect Spectral hag claws emerge from the walls. The trap then rolls initiative.

details.description: Spectral hag claws reach out from the walls of the gem-like chamber to grab the PCs' souls and pull them into the trap's onyx facets.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:25] (expert) or @Check[type:crafting|dc:25](expert) to find the weak spot and crack each facet, or dispel magic (4th level; counteract DC 23) to counteract each facet; the hazard has a number of facets equal to the number of PCs.
details.routine:
The hazard gains a number of actions equal to the number of PCs; it loses 1 action each round for each facet that has been disabled. Each claw tears at a different PC, who takes [[/r (2d10+9)[mental]]]{2d10 + 9 mental damage} (basic @Check[type:will|dc:27] save). On a failure, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] by the claw (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] DC 25). On a critical failure, or on a failure if they are already grabbed, they have their soul ripped from their body, which falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious]. Each round on their turn, the soul can attempt a @Check[type:intimidation|dc:25], @Check[type:occultism|dc:25], or @Check[type:survival|dc:25] check to fortify itself and return to its body as a three-action activity. The possible outcomes are as follows.

Critical Success The soul returns to their body, which loses the unconscious condition.

Success The soul returns to their body, which loses the unconscious condition, but gains the grabbed condition.

Failure The soul makes no progress toward escape.

Critical Failure The soul makes no progress toward escape and the target takes [[/r (2d10+9)[mental]]]{2d10 + 9 mental damage} until they are reduced to 0 Hit Points, after which they remain in captivity until the trap is defeated.

Each claw focuses on its target until the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points, after which it takes no action on its turn unless another facet is disabled or its target regains Hit Points.

source.value: Pathfinder Society Scenario #4-11: Prisoners of the Electric Castle
